title: Introducing the iOS Sharing Kit
description:
Not long ago we released a sharing kit for Android.
Today, weâ€™re equally excited to announce a similar sharing kit for iOS. With the sharing kit, you can add SoundCloud sharing to your iPhone and iPad apps with only a few lines of code.
We provide everything you need to let your users share their sounds to SoundCloud,
including authentication, UI and connections to other social networks like Facebook and Twitter.
